NAME Tophat
DLG ITM_2

ITM 4

01111111
NAME Shoe

DLG SPR_0
"""
Hello friend! Everyone here has something they can call their own! 
Maybe ask around and see if you can find your own thing! 
Talk to me when you find it!
"""

DLG ITM_0
"""
You found a nice warm cup of tea{
  - {item "0"} == 1 ?

}
"""

DLG ITM_1
"""
{
  - {item "0"} == 1 ?

  - else ?

}
"""

DLG ITM_2
"""
{
  - {item "Tophat"} == 1 ?

  - else ?

}
"""

DLG SPR_1
"""
{
  - TopHat == 1 ?
    {TopHat = 2}What? For me? Thanks man, here wear these and you'll have hops just me! 
  - Shoes == 1 ?
    Thanks again for the hat friend!
}{
  - TopHat == 2 ?
    {Shoes = 1}
  - TopHat == 2 ?
    Thanks for the hat my friend!
}{
  - TopHat == 0 ?
    Aww man, I wish I could get one of Top Hat Mans awesome top hats...
  - else ?

}
"""

DLG SPR_2
"""
{
  - else ?
    {TopHat = 1}
}{
  - TopHat == 1 ?
    Hello sir! I hear you are antiquated with my fine feline friend. Here's free top hat from me to you 
  - else ?

}
"""

DLG SPR_3
"""
{
  - Shoes == 0 ?
    I wonder how jump man jumps so high?
  - Shoes == 1 ?
    {Shield = 1}
{Shoes = 2}woah, jump man uses these? Thank you! Here, I found this in a small hole near one of the trees. You can keep it!
  - Shield == 1 ?
    I can't wait to jump as high as jump man!
}
"""

DLG SPR_4
"""
{
  - Shield == 0 ?
    OoOOOooOOO hAaAVVve YooOOOuU SEEeeEn mYYY SHHiiiIeLLd Anywheeerre
  - Shield == 1 ?
    {Shield = 2}
{Emblem = 1}THaaAAaank YOoOoOu. (You mysteriously find an emblem in your pocket.)
  - Shield == 2 ?
    THaaAAaank YOoOoOu.
}
"""

VAR TopHat
0

VAR Shoes
0

VAR Shield
0

VAR Emblem
0
